display_information.name: Donkey Support
display_information.description: Customer support tickets delivered straight to your Slack workspace
display_information.long_description: Donkey Support connects your website's chat widget to Slack. When visitors send messages through your website, support tickets are automatically created as Slack threads. Your team can respond directly from Slack, and messages sync in real-time back to the visitor. Close and reopen tickets with a single click, right from Slack.
